author: sky.cactus
content: Hmm, basically you are arguing for a public open source searcher?

author: sky.cactus
content: It will almost certainly be outcompeted by actual searchers, but one can imagine it being good enough to sway some percentage of people to switch away from relays.

author: butta
content: iirc the basic mev types cover most of the mev

author: butta
content: people without capital will need a third party searcher, but ~100eth is enough to construct a majority of the mev bundles

author: lukaszrozmej
content: Implemented consecutive block improvements between FCU and GetPayload in Nethermind but needs testing: https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/pull/4488
